info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 3:31AM MST until January 07 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MST THURSDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON THURSDAY TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches at lower elevations and 5 to 10 inches in the mountains. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Fergus, Chouteau, Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from Noon Thursday to 5 AM MST Friday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 3 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
